alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Baldwin, south central Putnam and northeastern Jones Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Browns Crossing, or 7 miles west of Milledgeville, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether, Ethridge, Plant Harlee Branch, Hardwick, Browns Crossing, Allenwood, Haddock, Resseaus Crossroads, Blountsville and Scottsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
